column4: I have Ubuntu on my laptop. Maybe 1-2 times per minute, it just freezes for a second (the entire X interface) and then comes back.
me too
but more like 5 mins
any solutions?
not as yet:  messages like ide2 wait for ready failed before probe!
where are you seeing these?
possibly ide2=0x1F0 in grub
/var/log/syslog just b4 hang
hang only recoverable with Ctrl-Alt-Prtscrn-S-U-B = you too?
no... not sure that is the right error
sometimes freeze recovers but top says all is well
see, mine just freezes for a second or two and always returns
it's probably something simple
like HD sleeping or video card or something
laptop by any chance?
I have this weird feeling it has something to do with power management]
I tried apic off... and apm not supported on my laptop
hmmm.
what is your plan for fix?
s/name.o/name/
are you doing 27 things at one or something?
yeah.
